name: ifsoGUI
short_description:
A graphical user interface for the BlitzMax language.featuring a skinnable interface with many common gadgets and an event system.

ifsoGUI enables the developer to quickly and easily add a GUI to his/her application or game. Including capabilities like function callbacks, an event system that includes common events like "Click", "Change", "Mouse Down", "Mouse Move", etc., mouse over graphics, and more.

This software was not written by myself, and is the fine work of an ex-BlitzMax user called Marcus (Taskmaster), He has kindly donated the software to the BlitzMax community, and as such, I've stored the module here for any users that wish to use it for their projects.
summary: A GUI for BlitzMax featuring a skinnable interface.
